General.Name: Hangzhou Heshun Technology Co.LTD.
General.Description: Hangzhou Heshun Technology Co.,LTD. engages in development, production, and sale of polyester film products in China and internationally. The company offers colored photoelectric base, transparent, and other functional films, including consumer electronics product process application substrates; electronics, electrical appliances, and packaging decoration; functional film type window films; and flame retardant films and other fields. Its products used in industrial fields, such as electronic products, electrical appliances, automobiles, construction, packaging, decoration, etc. Hangzhou Heshun Technology Co.,LTD. was founded in 2003 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Xie  Xiaorui
1.Title: CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
